name: Simulate Renin-Angiotensin System Dynamics
description: Simulate the time-dependent concentrations of renin-angiotensin system (RAS) components using ODE-based kinetic modeling
install: cd /tmp && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni.git biomni_repo && cd biomni_repo && pip install -e . && pip install numpy scipy pandas

inputs.name: INITIAL_CONCENTRATIONS
inputs.description: JSON dictionary of initial concentrations with keys: renin, angiotensinogen, angiotensin_I, angiotensin_II, ACE2_angiotensin_II, angiotensin_1_7 (format: {"renin": 1.0, "angiotensinogen": 10.0, "angiotensin_I": 0.5, "angiotensin_II": 0.2, "ACE2_angiotensin_II": 0.1, "angiotensin_1_7": 0.05})

inputs.name: RATE_CONSTANTS
inputs.description: JSON dictionary of kinetic rate constants with keys: k_ren, k_agt, k_ace, k_ace2, k_at1r, k_mas (format: {"k_ren": 0.5, "k_agt": 1.0, "k_ace": 0.8, "k_ace2": 0.3, "k_at1r": 0.2, "k_mas": 0.15})

inputs.name: FEEDBACK_PARAMS
inputs.description: JSON dictionary of feedback mechanism parameters with keys: fb_ang_II, fb_ace2 (format: {"fb_ang_II": 0.5, "fb_ace2": 0.3})

inputs.name: TIME_POINTS
inputs.description: Number of time points to evaluate
